http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=2182091

Version: 3.1.9
Language: Chinese (trad.)

Operating System: Windows XP
Language: Chinese (trad.)

1. Set default font font "composing e-mail" to "fixed width".

2. Compose a new e-mail. The default font is "fixed width". Fine.

3. Reply to an e-mail. The default fonts is "variable width". I think this should be "fixed width".

Thanks.

Reproducible: Always

Font control for HTML composition is problematic at best and is a "core" issue.
xref bug250539 bug 588347 bug 514265
These issues will most likely not be fixed anytime soon.
These extension might be of interest to you:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en/thunderbird/addon/4394
http://nic-nac-project.org/~kaosmos/realborders-en.html
